post:
**Website:**

https://spaceweb.eu/

**Who are we?:**

Our company Established in 2007 but we started provide hosting solutions since 2013. So we are here a while. Our company background is stable enought. We are a Hungarian company , but we provide support in HU and ENG language.


**Server Specs:**

HP Server Grade , 4 or 8 cpu core , Intel Xeon E5, 12 or 24GB DDR4 ECC memory , 100% SSD Disk

**Network:**

Private Datacenter in Germany , Nuremberg
200GB Monthly Traffic - 1Gbit/s connection

**Support:**

You could reach us by email, online chat, support ticket and mobile. (English Support)

**Our Stuff:**

Directadmin Control Panel - Custom theme - LiteSpeeD LsAPI - Cloudlinux - DDOS Protection (Up to 5Gbps) - Softaculous - Lets Encrypt Plugin - Daily Backups - PHP Changer 4.x 5.x 7.x

**Our goal:**

We want happy customers. We dont need just your money , we want to be happy. And dont worry! Our prices are not high.. but we give premium service for you.

**Security:**

Daily full backup - Real Time Data Replication - Raid 10 Protection - Cloudlinux CageFS Protection

**Our Storage**

100% SSD - Raid 10
 
**What we offer about shared hosting?**

1 CPU Core - 2048MB Maximum Memory Usage - 256MB Opcache Memory / User

-200GB Monthly Transfer

-Unlimited addon domain,aldomain,email user,ftp user,mysql database


**ORDER LINK:**

https://spaceweb.eu/


    HOW TO GET 50% OFF?
    Please open a support ticket after order and we will issue the 50% OFF (ONLY YEAR PAYMENT)
